summary.span: 表示一个自定义绑定元素，它支持使用对称加密的通道安全。

span.span: Represents a custom binding element that supports channel security using symmetric encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义绑定包含以特定顺序排列的绑定元素集合：首先添加表示绑定堆栈顶部的元素，其次是绑定堆栈中的下一个元素，依此类推。A custom binding contains a collection of binding elements arranged in a specific order: the element that represents the top of the binding stack is added first, the next element down in the binding stack, is added second, and so forth. ### 将此类添加到绑定中To add this class to a binding 1. 创建 。Create a . 2. 在绑定堆栈中创建将位于此绑定元素之上的自定义绑定元素，比如可选的 和 。Create custom binding elements that is above this binding element in the binding stack, such as the optional and . 3. 使用 方法，按照前面提到的顺序将已创建的元素添加到 。Add the created elements, in the order mentioned previously, to the using the method. 4. 创建 的实例，并将其添加到集合。Create an instance of and add it to the collection. 5. 将任何其他自定义绑定元素添加到集合，比如 。Add any additional custom binding elements to the collection, such as . > [!NOTE] > 在创建此对象的实例后，您应该将其基类 的属性视为不可变的。Once an instance of this object is created, you should treat the properties of its base class, , as immutable. 对某些属性调用 `set` 可能会产生不可预知的后果：绑定的行为可能就好像属性保留了其旧值一样，并出现运行时错误，该错误是问题的唯一迹象。Calling `set` on some properties may have unpredictable effects: the binding may behave as if the property retained its old value, with a run-time failure being the only indication of an issue. 已知具有此行为的两个属性为 和 。Two properties known to behave this way are and . 其他某些属性可能也是如此。There may be other properties for which this is true.

summary.span: 创建此类的新实例（从当前类初始化）。

span.span: Creates a new instance of this class initialized from the current one.

returns.span: 一个 对象，其属性值等于当前实例的属性值。

span.span: A object with property values equal to those of the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这将创建当前绑定元素对象树的完整副本，也称为深层克隆。This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone. 对象的深层克隆创建对象的副本以及该对象直接或间接引用的所有内容的副本。A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. 这也被描述为复制整个对象图。This can also be described as copying the entire object graph. 通过返回深层克隆，运行时将能够支持多个自定义绑定共用一个自定义绑定元素的情况。Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element. 如果未返回深层克隆，则运行时行为将不可确定。If a deep clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined. 相比之下，对象的浅表克隆只是对象本身的副本。A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表复制不创建所引用对象的副本，而是仅复制对原始对象的引用。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.

span.span: The that specifies how the message is protected.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果加密的消息中没有任何内容，则不会对签名元素进行加密，即使当 属性设置为 也是如此。If there is nothing in the message that is encrypted, the signature element is not encrypted even when the property is set to . 系统提供的绑定也会出现此行为。This behavior occurs even with system-provided bindings. 不过，WCF 生成的 WSDL 仍包含 `` 断言。However, the WSDL generated by WCF still contains the `` assertion. 有关成员及其说明的列表，请参见 。For a listing of the members and their descriptions, see . ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何设置此属性。The following code shows how to set this property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否必须确认消息签名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether message signatures must be confirmed.

value.span: 如果必须确认消息签名，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if message signatures must be confirmed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定是否必须加密签名。This property specifies whether the signature must be encrypted. 如果该值为 `true`，则必须加密主签名，而且还必须加密任何签名确认元素。If the value is `true`, the primary signature must be encrypted and any signature confirmation elements must also be encrypted. 如果该值为 `false`，则不必加密主签名，而且也不必加密任何签名确认元素。If the value is `false`, the primary signature must not be encrypted and any signature confirmation elements must not be encrypted.

span.span: to indicate that derived keys are required; otherwise, .

summary.span: 设置一个值，该值指示是否需要派生密钥。

span.span: Sets a value that indicates whether derived keys are required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生密钥是从现有密钥创建而来。使用它就可以在对话过程中使用不同的密钥。A derived key is created from an existing key and makes it possible to vary the key used in the course of a conversation. 这会增加黑客解密通信的难度。This makes it more difficult for a hacker to decrypt the communication.

span.span: The that you can use to modify the exporting process.

span.span: The that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.

summary.span: 导出有关绑定的自定义策略断言。

span.span: Exports a custom policy assertion about bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将与绑定相关的语句写入特定协定公开的 WSDL 信息，并由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 用于与绑定堆栈中存在此自定义绑定元素的客户端通信。This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) to communicate to clients of the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack. 此方法接受两个参数： 和 对象。This method takes two parameters: the and objects. 使用 , 和 方法以获取从不同范围导出的策略断言的集合。Use the , , and methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes. 然后，使用此方法将您自己的策略断言添加到适当的集合中。Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection. 属性可公开正在导出的终结点的 。The property exposes the for the endpoint that is being exported. 这样，此方法就可正确限定它们的导出策略断言的范围。This allows this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions. 例如，代码中的安全属性可以将行为添加到指示安全策略断言应该添加到的位置的 。For example, security attributes in code may add behaviors to the that indicate where security policy assertions should be added. 一旦将自定义策略断言附加到 WSDL 信息，客户端就可以通过实现 接口来检测和导入自定义绑定断言。Once custom policy assertions are attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing the interface.
